responsabilities.text: Created a personal portfolio platform using React (Next.js), Typescript and Tailwind CSS.
Learned to develop custom hooks to provide reusable and efficient solutions.
Learned to develop a backend architecture and to implement user authentication and role-based access control.
Enables efficient management and delivery of data, allowing me to update and showcase my latest projects effortlessly.
Implemented features such as displaying match data between Dota 2 teams, comprehensive hero information, blogs, news, and game updates.
Acquired valuable knowledge and hands-on experience in working with APIs to fetch real-time match data and hero statistics.
Learned to incorporate serverless functions, such as Lambda functions.
Significantly improved user engagement and satisfaction by providing a seamless and interactive Dota 2 experience.
Worked closely with the clients on a wide range of projects.
Learned the importance of actively listen to client's feedback.
By tailoring my designs to effectively communicate the clients' messages, I significantly increased client satisfaction.
